mapper.insert: INSERT INTO v2h_carport( CARPORT_ID, INVERTER_TRAFFIC_STATUS, INVERTER_FAULT_STATUS, INVERTER_BYPASS_INPUT, INVERTER_OUTPUT_VOLTAGE, INVERTER_TEMPERRATURE, INVERTER_OUTPUTE, INVERTER_OUT_POWER, INVERTER_POWER_FACTOR, BMS_VOLTAGE, BATTERY_SOC, BATTERY_ELECTRICITY, FLOTROL_TRAFFIC_STATUS, FLOTROL_RUNNING_STATUS, FLOTROL_OUTPUT_VOLTAGE, FLOTROL_OUTPUT_ELECTRICITY, ASC_TRAFFIC_STATUS, ASC_RUNNING_STATUS, ASC_CONNECTION_STATUS, INSERT_DATE, status ) VALUES ( #{CarportID}, #{InverterTrafficStatus}, #{InverterFaultStatus}, #{InverterBypassInput}, #{InverterOutputVoltage}, #{InverterTemperrature}, #{InverterOutpute}, #{InverterOutPower}, #{InverterPowerFactor}, #{BmsVoltage}, #{BatterySoc}, #{BatteryElectricity}, #{FlotrolTrafficStatus}, #{FlotrolRunningStatus}, #{FlotrolOutputVoltage}, #{FlotrolOutputElectricity}, #{AscTrafficStatus}, #{AscRunningStatus}, #{AscConnectionStatus}, #{InsertDate}, 1 )
mapper.update: update v2h_carport set INVERTER_TRAFFIC_STATUS=#{InverterTrafficStatus}, INVERTER_FAULT_STATUS=#{InverterFaultStatus}, INVERTER_BYPASS_INPUT=#{InverterBypassInput}, INVERTER_OUTPUT_VOLTAGE=#{InverterOutputVoltage}, INVERTER_TEMPERRATURE=#{InverterTemperrature}, INVERTER_OUTPUTE=#{InverterOutpute}, INVERTER_OUT_POWER=#{InverterOutPower}, INVERTER_POWER_FACTOR=#{InverterPowerFactor}, BMS_VOLTAGE=#{BmsVoltage}, BATTERY_SOC=#{BatterySoc}, FLOTROL_TRAFFIC_STATUS=#{FlotrolTrafficStatus}, FLOTROL_RUNNING_STATUS=#{FlotrolRunningStatus}, FLOTROL_OUTPUT_VOLTAGE=#{FlotrolOutputVoltage}, FLOTROL_OUTPUT_ELECTRICITY=#{FlotrolOutputElectricity}, ASC_TRAFFIC_STATUS=#{AscTrafficStatus}, ASC_RUNNING_STATUS=#{AscRunningStatus}, ASC_CONNECTION_STATUS=#{AscConnectionStatus}, INSERT_DATE=#{InsertDate}, STATUS=#{Status}, last_changed=now() where status=1 AND CARPORT_ID=#{CarportID}
update v2h_carport set status=-1 where CARPORT_ID=#{CarportID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM v2h_carport WHERE status=1 AND CARPORT_ID=#{CarportID}
SELECT count(CARPORT_ID) as totalCount FROM v2h_carport WHERE STATUS=1
